div.font: Congratulations to the players that made the All District Team!
Next week only packet pickup and meal distribution will be on Tuesday April 14, 2020 at the same time because of Easter.
La próxima semana, solo la recogida de paquetes y la distribución de comidas serán el martes 14 de Abril de 2020 al mismo tiempo debido a la Pascua.

span.div: School Closing and Modified Meal Distributions

Due to Governor Abbot's executive order concerning the COVID 19 virus, Amherst ISD will be closed until Monday, May 4th. Off-campus Instruction (packets) is scheduled to continue on Mondays from 8:00-10:00 AM or 4:00-5:30 PM. You may drop off any work and pick up any new packets for the previous weeks. The school district is continuing to develop a way to provide on-line help for students who need it. Thank you for your understanding as we navigate this difficult time.

During this closure period, school will be providing both breakfast and lunch to students in the district, on Mondays between the hours of 8:00 - 10:00 AM. The district will distribute for the whole week a combined pick up for both breakfast and lunch only on Mondays starting Monday April 6, 2020 to limit exposure to the virus.
We are committed to the safety of all of the Amherst ISD community. Please continue to monitor our web site for further information.
Cierre de escuelas y distribución de comidas modificadas

Debido a la orden ejecutiva del Gobernador Abbot sobre el virus COVID 19, Amherst ISD permanecerá cerrado hasta el lunes 4 de Mayo. La instrucción fuera del campus (paquetes) está programada para continuar los lunes de 8: 00-10: 00 a.m. o 4: 00-5: 30 p.m. Puede dejar cualquier trabajo y recoger cualquier paquete nuevo para las semanas anteriores. El distrito escolar continúa desarrollando una forma de proporcionar ayuda en línea para los estudiantes que la necesitan. Gracias por su comprensión mientras navegamos en este momento difícil.

Durante este período de cierre, la escuela proporcionará desayuno y almuerzo a los estudiantes en el distrito, los lunes entre las 8:00 y las 10:00 a.m. El distrito distribuirá durante toda la semana un retiro combinado para el desayuno y el almuerzo solo los lunes a partir del lunes 6 de Abril de 2020 para limitar la exposición al virus. Estamos comprometidos con la seguridad de toda la comunidad de Amherst ISD. Continúe monitoreando nuestro sitio web para obtener más información.

div.font: Information will be posted below as it becomes available, so please check back.

font.p: Please excuse the translations from English to Spanish. I do the best I can using Google translate.

font.span: Por favor, disculpe las traducciones del inglés al español. Hago lo mejor que puedo usando el traductor de Google.

p.font: When visiting please get a visitor pass at the office.

br.p: Due to the COVID 19 response, the district will be closed until at least April 3rd. During this closure period, school will be providing both breakfast and lunch to students in the district. As we did with packet pickups, the meals will need to be picked up at the west end of the school. On Monday, March 30th between the hours of 9:30 - 11:00 pm, the district will have available a combined pick up for both breakfast and lunch. The rest of the week, we will have meals available for pick up at 8:30-10:00.

Off-campus Instruction (packets) is scheduled to continue on March 30th from 9:30-11:00 AM or 4:00-5:30 PM. You may drop off any work and pick up any new packets for the week of March 30th. The school district is continuing to develop a way to provide on-line help for students who need it. More detailed information regarding off-campus instruction and online instruction will be sent out later on during the week of the 30th.
Please continue to monitor the school website at: https://www.amherstisd.com/

Debido a la respuesta de COVID 19, el distrito estará cerrado al menos hasta el 3 de abril. Durante este período de cierre, la escuela proporcionará desayuno y almuerzo a los estudiantes del distrito. Como hicimos con la recogida de paquetes, las comidas deberán recogerse en el extremo oeste de la escuela.El lunes 30 de marzo entre las 9:30 y las 11:00 pm, el distrito tendrá disponible un servicio de recogida combinado para el desayuno y el almuerzo. El resto de la semana, tendremos comidas disponibles para recoger a las 8:30-10:00.

La instrucción fuera del campus (paquetes) está programada para continuar el 30 de marzo de 9:30-11:00 a.m. o 4:00-5:30 p.m. Puede dejar cualquier trabajo y recoger cualquier paquete nuevo para la semana del 30 de marzo. El distrito escolar continúa desarrollando una forma de proporcionar ayuda en línea para los estudiantes que la necesitan.Más tarde, durante la semana del 30, se enviará información más detallada sobre la instrucción fuera del campus y la instrucción en línea.
Continúe monitoreando el sitio web de la escuela en: https://www.amherstisd.com/
Check The Links below under AISD News for updates on our response to the COVID 19 virus.

Contact Mrs. Meir @ sbaker@esc17.net to order your yearbook or come by the Superintendent's office to pick it up. The cost is only $20 plus shipping (if you have it sent to you).

div.p: Past editions of the Growl year book are available for $10. Shipping and Handling is $5 or you can pick it up at the school. These years are still available:

br.p: (* Denotes years Amherst won the Sixman Football State Championship)
If you would like to have one contact Mrs. Meir @ 806-246-7729 or sbaker@esc17.net.

div.p: The Parent Portal allows a student's parent or legal guardian access to his/her grades and attendance. In order to use this tool, you must receive a letter from Amherst ISD with a Portal ID code. Once you have received this letter, you will need to follow the directions (which you can access in the Attachment below which opens in Microsoft Word) to set up your account. Please note that Amherst ISD is not capable of retrieving lost logins, or passwords so it is imperative that you keep this information in a safe place.

These are files listed in the Adobe PDF format. One is for the Pre-Kindergarten and Kindergarten classes and the other is for the Elementary through High School. Watch for sales and have a great year.
The current student handbook for your reading pleasure/research.

br.p: The Student Code of Conduct(“Code”)is the district’s response to the requirements of Chapter 37 of the Texas Education Code.
